trans-unit.source: Represents the textual content of grammar elements defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje zawartość tekstową gramatyki elementy zdefiniowane w sieci World Wide Web konsorcjum W3C [mowy rozpoznawania gramatyki specyfikacji (SRGS) w wersji 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

trans-unit.source: The SrgsText class represents the text found within a set of SRGS element tags.
trans-unit.target: Klasa SrgsText reprezentuje tekst wewnątrz zestawu tagów element SRGS.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object is constructed with a <xref:System.String> parameter, a SrgsText object is created with its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> property initialized to the value of that parameter.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>obiekt jest tworzony z <xref:System.String>parametru, tworzony jest obiekt SrgsText z jego <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A>Właściwości ustawiana na wartość tego parametru.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> collection on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class.
This is the default constructor for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class, specifying the text of the instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> klasy Określanie tekstu wystąpienia.

trans-unit.source: The value used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text*> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> instance.
Gets or sets the text contained within the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class instance.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia tekst zawarty w <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> wystąpienie klasy.

trans-unit.source: The text contained within the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> instance.
An attempt is made to set Text to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aby ustawić tekst podejmowana jest próba <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
